issue.title: [Trivial] Update license year range to 2019
issue.body:
Bitcoin Core is going to become 10 so the license year range also needs an update.
2019 is coming very soon so it is the time to update the year range like every year.

Same as #12063

events.body: I wonder if we should just get rid of the years. They don't do anything useful...?

> Scripted diff?

Bumping the manpage required compiling the binaries, which is not suitable for a scripted diff.

> I wonder if we should just get rid of the years. They don't do anything useful...?

Agree, but that is a legal question that needs some more discussion.
@MarcoFalke how about scripting this one in the future? 06ba77973e7f8938c8461bffeee3718a8f7712f5

issue.title: Update copyrights to 2019
issue.body: This updates copyrights where mentioned to include the current year of 2019.
